faqs.question: What are your business hours?
faqs.answer: We are open Monday to Friday, 9 AM to 6 PM EST. Our support team is available during these hours to assist you.

faqs.question: How do I reset my password?
faqs.answer: To reset your password, click on 'Forgot Password' on the login page. Enter your email address, and we'll send you a reset link within a few minutes.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, and bank transfers for enterprise customers.

faqs.question: How can I contact customer support?
faqs.answer: You can reach our customer support team via email at support@example.com, phone at 1-800-123-4567, or through this chat. We typically respond within 24 hours.

faqs.question: Do you offer refunds?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied with our service, contact us within 30 days of purchase for a full refund.
